thread.section_title: The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for our NYC weekend event
thread.title_full: Perfect for our NYC weekend event - Review of The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: douglas s
title: Perfect for our NYC weekend event
text:
Chose for convenience to MSG and large discount. Didn't plan to spend much time in room. Very clean well appointed, with single queen. Very comfortable.
Bathroom a little spare, old style slim tub , with single towel bar and single glass shelf - no countertop - that wasn't large enough for dop kit. Not sure couple would have been satisfied but that may be why they assigned it to single person.
Breakfast in their 24/7 diner efficient but TexMex omelet was fairly tasteless.
Room Tip: Old hotel. Check out bathroom if important to you. See more room tips
